attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know that smoking is very bad for our health, so why hasn't all tobacco products been banned.  Please ban all tobacco products to save the lives of everyone, smokers and non-smokers.  Smoking is just as bad, if not worse than heroin, as it kills much more people than heroin & other drugs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
